title: Ready Eddie Go!
overview: The series follows 6-year-old Eddie who is autistic, as he navigates everyday real-life experiences for the very first time.Whether it's going to get his hair cut or trying an unfamiliar vegetable, the series captures moments full of fantasy and comedy, with Eddie using his imagination throughout.Â  With his family and friends cheering him on, Eddie learns to play his way and learns strategies that will help him next time that situation arises
